General.Name: NPC Resources Bhd
General.Description: NPC Resources Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in oil palm plantation and milling activities in Malaysia and Indonesia. It operates through Plantation and Milling, Fishery, and Hotelier segments. It engages in the cultivation and sale of oil palm products. The company operates approximately 10,776 hectares of plantation land, including 6,767 hectares located in the Sandakan region and 4,009 hectares in the Banggi Island of Sabah; and has a total plantation land area of 45,064 hectares in Kalimantan Timur, Indonesia. It is also involved in property letting, fresh fruit bunches trading, transportation, management, and hotelier, as well as fish rearing and selling, and hatchery businesses. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Sandakan, Malaysia.
